meico.pitches

Class FeatureVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.pitches.FeatureVector

  • public class FeatureVector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents one pitch feature, i.e. an array of FeatureElements that form the feature vector.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt.

      • add

        public boolean add(FeatureVector feature)
        This adds up the energy and note ids of two feature vectors. But be aware that the vectors should have the same size. Otherwise correctness of this operation cannot be ensured.
        Parameters:
        feature - the feature vector to be added
        Returns:

      • addEnergy

        public boolean addEnergy(double[] energy)
        This adds only an energy vector to the feature vector, no ids. But be aware that the vectors should have the same size. Otherwise correctness of this operation cannot be ensured.
        Parameters:
        energy -
        Returns:
